text:
When I place a ulink a footnote, the positioning of the hyperlink does not 
correspond to the position of the text.  It appears that the hyperlink is 
positioned one line below the text it is supposed to correspond to.  Here is 
the XSL-FO that produced the error:

This line should reference a footnote with a hyperlink.
<fo:footnote>
  <fo:inline><fo:inline vertical-align="super" font-
size="90%">2</fo:inline></fo:inline>
  <fo:footnote-body font-family="serif" font-size="8pt">
    <fo:block>
      <fo:inline vertical-align="super" font-size="90%">2</fo:inline>
      The <fo:inline font-style="italic"><fo:basic-link external-
destination="http://www.docbook.org">emphasized text</fo:basic-
link></fo:inline> 
      should appear linked to www.docbook.org.
    </fo:block>
  </fo:footnote-body>
</fo:footnote>
creator: sstafford@modeln.com
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
